ygData.subject: Re: Possible quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I tried experementing with this last night - the Bard in Kelethin that gives you the mail pouch told you the wrong person to give it to.  If you give it to
ygData.messageBody:
> I got nothing but a thank you on the Kelethin to Freeport, but that's
> apparently due to either the lunacy of the gods in Freeport or ambiguous
> instructions.

I tried experementing with this last night - the Bard in Kelethin that
gives you the mail pouch told you the wrong person to give it to. If
you give it to Tommy TwoTone or whatever his name is (the guy who gives
you the pouch for the Freeport to Kelethin run), you'll get the money
and experience.

It seems that there are two types of quests, from hub city to hub city
which use the mail pouches and from sattelite to hub which use letters.
The hub vendors deliver to each other and the satellites deliver to a
hub. Felicity is a satelite (cause she gives you a letter) and Two-
Tone is a hub.

I always seem to get 9 gp for a hub delivery, but maybe I haven;t done
enough of them yet.

The strange thing is after making a hub delivery, the Kelethin and Freeport
hub people both say "ask my wife Eve if you want to deliver more mail",
even the Kelethin hub who is a female wood elf. Funny...

Guess the quest needs a bit more work.

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.
